headline: Workday (WDAY) Just Got Downgraded—Here’s Why Analysts Are Worried About AI
summary: Workday, Inc. (NASDAQ:WDAY) is one of the Trending AI Stocks on Wall Street. On July 10, Piper Sandler analyst Brent Bracelin downgraded the stock from “Neutral” to Underweight with a price target of $235.00. The rating downgrade follows major changes in CIO spending priorities driven by artificial intelligence. “Our latest CIO survey reinforced a bullish […]
